snippet.title: ZADETTE : official trailer / ZADETTE : bande annonce officielle
snippet.description:
ZADETTE is a parody of the 80s arcade games, the heroes were muscular, the graphics quality of a game was judged by the size of the sprites and the strident music of the audio chips punctuated the levels.

Despite its unique aesthetic, ZADETTE offers a real challenge. To complete the adventure you will need to familiarize yourself with its old-fashioned mechanics, get used to controlling a disproportionate character, and learn to take advantage of its big jumps and devastating sword strike.

The adventure is 7 levels and 7 bosses long, all accompanied by music using the Yamaha YM2612 synthesizer (Sega Genesis' sound chip), to best reproduce the specific sounds of the melodies of the time.

If you like the Ghosts'n Goblins series, old obscure arcade games such as Rastan and Altered Beast, 16-bit era classics like Gods and Sword of Sodan… or if you are looking for a real challenge… You will probably have fun playing ZADETTE!

ZADETTE on Steam :  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510670/ 
ZADETTE on Twitter : https://twitter.com/Zadette_theGame

------

Découvrez dans cette bande annonce ZADETTE, le jeu parodique à l'ambiance rétrogaming / arcade du Club Des Sacs. Le jeu sortira sur Steam le 1er mars 2021.

"Dans un monde sombre et désolé, le grand guerrier Zadette est sur le point de vivre la plus grande quête de tous les temps. A travers plaines arides, marécages, grottes, il devra battre de nombreux monstres pour atteindre la source du mal. Préparez-vous à vivre une aventure au-delà de l'imagination."


Page steam de ZADETTE :  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1510670/ 
Twitter officiel de ZADETTE : https://twitter.com/Zadette_theGame

-------------------

Suivez Le Club Des Sacs pour ne rien rater!
https://twitter.com/LeClubDesSacs
https://www.facebook.com/leclubdessacs
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/clubdessacs
